metadata.title: CVE-2024-36004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i40e: Do not use WQ_MEM_RECLAIM flag for workqueueIssue reported by customer during SRIOV testing, call trace:When both i40e and the i40iw driver are loaded, a warningin check_flush_dependency is being triggered. This seemsto be because of the i40e driver workqueue is allocated withthe WQ_MEM_RECLAIM flag, and the i40iw one is not.Similar error was encountered on ice too and it was fixed byremoving the flag.
